originalTitle: What a seventh term for 81-year-old leader means for Uganda
title: What a seventh term for 81-year-old leader means for Uganda
content: Yoweri Museveni has won a record seventh term in elections after promising that the fledgling oil sector will boost the economy.

originalTitle: 'I want to show the world what Africa is': YouTube star brings joy and tears on tour
title: 'I want to show the world what Africa is': YouTube star brings joy and tears on tour
content: "I love the love in Africa. The energy here is crazy," he says on his maiden tour of the continent.

originalTitle: Will final be Mane's last Afcon dance with Senegal?
title: Will final be Mane's last Afcon dance with Senegal?
content: Forward Sadio Mane looks to help inspire Senegal to glory against host nation Morocco after the 33-year-old said this will be his "last Afcon final".

originalTitle: Two high-speed trains collide in Spain, killing at least 10
title: Two high-speed trains collide in Spain, killing at least 10
content: Authorities have deployed mobile intensive care units to the crash site near Adamuz, where 25 people are injured.

originalTitle: Senegal beat hosts Morocco to win AFCON 2025 after farcical walk-off
title: Senegal beat hosts Morocco to win AFCON 2025 after farcical walk-off
content: Pape Gueye scores in 1-0 win after extra-time after Senegal leave the field in protest at penalty decision.

originalTitle: Will the Syrian army end up controlling Kurdish-held areas?
title: Will the Syrian army end up controlling Kurdish-held areas?
content: The army has made significant territorial gains after intense battles with the SDF.

originalTitle: At least 21 killed in Spain after crash involving high-speed trains
title: At least 21 killed in Spain after crash involving high-speed trains
content: The incident happened near the town of Adamuz, close to the city of Cordoba.

originalTitle: 'Europe won't be blackmailed,' Danish PM says in wake of Trump Greenland threats
title: 'Europe won't be blackmailed,' Danish PM says in wake of Trump Greenland threats
content: The US president threatens to impose tariffs on countries that oppose his plans to take over the territory.

originalTitle: Syria agrees ceasefire with Kurdish-led forces after two weeks of clashes
title: Syria agrees ceasefire with Kurdish-led forces after two weeks of clashes
content: President Ahmed al-Sharaa said the deal would allow the Syrian state to reassert control over most areas.

originalTitle: 'Not a good look' - Champions Senegal walk off pitch over penalty in Afcon final
title: 'Not a good look' - Champions Senegal walk off pitch over penalty in Afcon final
content: Senegal beat Morocco to win the Africa Cup of Nations for a second time - but only after the final was overshadowed when they temporarily refuse to play after the hosts are awarded a controversial stoppage time-penalty with the match 0-0.

title: Watch: Match of the Day
content: Kelly Cates presents highlights of Aston Villa v Everton and Wolves v Newcastle United.

originalTitle: 'Arsenal will never forgive themselves if they don't win title now'
title: 'Arsenal will never forgive themselves if they don't win title now'
content: This is Mikel Arteta and Arsenal's "now or never" moment as Premier League title rivals stumble badly, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
